quest.name: In Agama's Footsteps
journal:
 Quest Sync
The weary Radiant seeks someone willing to brave the wilderness.
objectives: Search for refugees near Agama Temple.
Protect the unfortunate straggler and guide him to the entrance of Palaka's Stand.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER04257
dialogue.text: Ah, what luck. You look capable of braving the jungles unscathed. Would you help me search for a group of refugees I became separated from?

dialogue.name: SOLDIER04257
dialogue.text: As the chaos unfolded around us, I fled in the direction of Agama Temple along with a few others. There, one of those terrible beasts fell upon us, and I lost track of my group in the chaos.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER04257
dialogue.text: While I was able to make my way here, none of the others have, and I worry for their safety. I would like nothing more than to search myself, but all hands are required to defend this place.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER04257
dialogue.text: Agama Temple is to the west. Please, journey there and guide anyone you can find back here. I only hope that some managed to survive the madness.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER04257
dialogue.text: We were hiding near Agama Temple, to the west. If you find anyone alive, please guide them here so they can be better protected. May the gods watch over you.

dialogue.name: RESIDENTS04257
dialogue.text: Who...who are you? Are you here to save me?

dialogue.name: RESIDENTS04257
dialogue.text: Of course, I knew she wouldn't forget about us! The beast prowled the area for some time, but I managed to find refuge among these rocks.

dialogue.name: RESIDENTS04257
dialogue.text: However, I've been too frightened to set foot from their shelter for fear of drawing the attention of some hungry animal. But with you here, I believe I can find the courage. Will you accompany me to Palaka's Stand?

dialogue.name: RESIDENTS04257
dialogue.text: Thank you! Now, let us tread carefully.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Escort the unfortunate straggler safely to Palaka's Stand. Should you fail to defend him, or move too far away, he will return to the vicinity of Agama Temple, where you may rendezvous with him before trying again.

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: As if the jungle wasn't dangerous enough already...

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: No... You were supposed to be...

dialogue.name: RESIDENTS04257
dialogue.text: We're going to Palaka's Stand, yes? Lead the way!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have failed to successfully escort the unfortunate straggler to Palaka's Stand. Return to the vicinity of Agama Temple and speak with him to begin once more.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have lost sight of the unfortunate straggler. Retrace your steps to find them, then escort them safely to Palaka's Stand.

dialogue.name: RESIDENTS04257
dialogue.text: I don't know how to thank you! You've saved my life!

dialogue.name: RESIDENTS04257
dialogue.text: Please tell that brave woman from the Radiant Host that I've arrived safe and sound. I must think of a way to repay your bravery.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER04257
dialogue.text: I watched your arrival. I recognized that man from the group I was with, and I am overjoyed to see him safe.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER04257
dialogue.text: Thank you for escorting him here. Truly you are worthy of the reputation you've earned─I daresay even Agama would be awed by your bravery.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER04257
dialogue.text: He was a storied mendicant of the Arkasodara. When the Hyurs landed ashore this island and war broke out, he spared no effort to save the lives of all who were injured in the conflict. He saw no tribes, only those in need.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER04257
dialogue.text: He is not so different from you, who throws herselfhimself into the maw of danger to save someone they've never met. If Agama's spirit lives on today, it is through your selfless deeds!

dialogue.name: SOLDIER04257
dialogue.text: Take this as a reward, although I have no doubt you would deny it if I let you. Once my watch has ended, I shall patrol the woods in search of any more hiding amongst the trees.
